data.title: Directions to the Collin County Courthouse
data.meta_description: How to get to the Russell A. Steindam Courts Building – Collin County Courthouse 2100 Bloomdale Rd. McKinney, TX 75071
data.text:
Russell A. Steindam Courts Building – Collin County Courthouse

2100 Bloomdale Rd.

McKinney, TX 75071

If you are traveling to Collin County Courthouse from the South (Allen, Plano, Dallas)

Travel on U.S. 75 North

Exit Bloomdale Rd. – 42B

Follow the Service Rd. (North)

Turn left onto Bloomdale Rd.

Take Bloomdale Rd. for about .4 miles (You will see the courthouse on your right)

Take a right into the Collin County Administration Building parking lot – free parking is available.

If you are traveling to Collin County Courthouse from the North (Anna, Melissa, Van Alstyne)

Travel on U.S. 75 South

Exit Weston Rd. – 43

Follow the Service Rd. until you reach Bloomdale Rd.

Turn right onto Bloomdale Rd.

Continue on Bloomdale Rd. for about .2 miles (You will see the courthouse on your right)

Take a right into the Collin County Administration Building parking lot – free parking is available.

If you are traveling to Collin County Courthouse from the East (Princeton, Farmersville)

Travel on Highway 380 West to U.S. 75

Turn right onto the U.S. 75 North Service Rd

Follow the Service Rd. (North) for approximately 1.6 miles

Turn left onto Bloomdale Rd

Continue West on Bloomdale for about .4 miles (You will see the courthouse on your right)

Take a right into the Collin County Administration Building parking lot – free parking is available.

If you are traveling to Collin County Courthouse from the West (Frisco, The Colony)
